message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  I'm asking for $13,000 to start.  What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate the value of the product you're offering. I'd like to make a counteroffer at $9,500.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product is worth significantly more to me. I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,500.  I think this is a fair price that reflects its true value.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer at $10,000.
